column5: Our charming 1928 craftsman is nestled in Historic Monticello Park and boasts 2 spacious bedrooms, 2 full private baths, living/dining combo and third room that is currently used as our playroom/office/media room. However, it can easily be converted into a sleeping space using our available queen air mattress. Our home has been fully renovated with an updated kitchen featuring granite counters and gas cooking. Historic features include original fireplace, hardwood flooring, and crown molding.
